item.title: LOG 4.5: Hello Germany, From Bangalore
item.description: 9th May 2014 My dear friends, I said I’d write, so here I am ðŸ™‚ My thoughts and dreams wander back to you all often. I have been away from Oldenburg for longer than a month before for holidays but this time, even when it had only been two weeks, it felt like longer.
